6624531f-65e2-4cd2-b7c3-ad050e1bafa6.description: Start your day with this healthy and appetizing meal. Fresh cracked eggs scrambled to perfection. Served in a toasted tortilla with hash browns, onions, tomato, pepper, cheese, and sliced jalapeno to make the dish pop with flavor.

optional.group_name: Burrito Modifier (please note its fully loaded please add in notes if you would like to remove any modifier)

options.name: No A smear of light mayo

ef6bad96-0e96-4c28-a19c-ff7c817e943f.name: Mediterranean Toast
ef6bad96-0e96-4c28-a19c-ff7c817e943f.description: Embark on a flavor adventure with our tantalizing Sourdough Toasted Sandwich. Grilled babaganush, roasted eggplant bits, and creamy feta cheese unite on toasted sourdough, harmonizing beautifully with a drizzle of golden honey. Prepare your taste buds for a symphony of smoky, roasted, tangy, and sweet sensations in every heavenly bite. Satisfaction awaits in this exquisite fusion of Mediterranean-inspired ingredients.
